name: EmailPostDeliveryEvents
description: Office 365 security events occurred post email delivery to recipient mailbox.

properties.name: ActionTrigger
properties.description: Indicates whether an action was triggered by an administrator (manually or through approval of a pending automated action), or by some special mechanism, such as a ZAP or Dynamic Delivery.

properties.name: ActionType
properties.description: Type of activity that triggered the event.

properties.name: DeliveryLocation
properties.description: Delivered email location: Inbox/Folder, On-premises/External, Junk, Quarantine, Failed, Dropped, Deleted items.

properties.name: InternetMessageId
properties.description: Public-facing identifier for the email that is set by the sending email system.

properties.name: MachineGroup
properties.description: Machine-group used by role-based access control to determine access to the machine.

properties.name: NetworkMessageId
properties.description: Email unique identifier, generated by Office 365.

properties.name: RecipientEmailAddress
properties.description: Recipient email address, or email address of the recipient after distribution list expansion.

properties.name: TimeGenerated
properties.description: Date and time (UTC) when the record was generated.

properties.name: Timestamp
properties.description: Date and time (UTC) when the record was generated.
